title: 2 Easy Ways to Activate a Microsoft Office 2010 Product Key

steps.title: Go to File > Help in Word.
steps.content: Go to File > Help in Word. If Word is not already open, you can open it by double-clicking on the Microsoft Word icon on your desktop, or you can search for it in the taskbar search bar.

steps.title: Click on Activate Product.
steps.content: Click on Activate Product . The Activation Wizard will display on-screen. If Activate Product is not displayed under Help , your software has already been activated, and no further action is needed.

steps.title: Select the option to activate online using the Internet.
steps.content: Select the option to activate online using the Internet. This is the recommended way to activate Microsoft Word 2010.

steps.title: Follow the steps in the online Activation Wizard.
steps.content: Follow the steps in the online Activation Wizard. You will be required to enter the product key, as well as your name and contact information. The product key consists of 25 characters, and can be found printed on the receipt or packaging associated with Microsoft Office 2010. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Go to File > Help in Word.
steps.content: Go to File > Help in Word. If Word is not already open, you can open it by double-clicking on the Microsoft Word icon on your desktop, or you can search for it in the taskbar search bar.

steps.title: Click on Activate Product.
steps.content: Click on Activate Product . The Activation Wizard will display on-screen. If Activate Product is not displayed under Help , your software has already been activated, and no further action is needed.

steps.title: Select the option to activate by telephone.
steps.content: Select the option to activate by telephone. If you have a slow internet connection, this is a better option than activating Word online.

steps.title: Select your country or region.
steps.content: Select your country or region. Microsoft will provide you with the telephone number for the Activation Center in your region. If you get an error that says "Telephone activation is no longer supported for your product", go to Microsoft's website to get the phone number for activation.

steps.title: Call the telephone number provided to reach the Activation Center.
steps.content: Call the telephone number provided to reach the Activation Center. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, call 800-718-1599 in the US or 716-871-6859 outside of the US for TT/TTY service. TT/TTY service is only available in English.

steps.title: Provide the installation ID when prompted.
steps.content: Provide the installation ID when prompted. The installation ID will be on your screen. You'll need to read the ID aloud into the phone.

steps.title: Provide any further information requested by the prompts.
steps.content: Provide any further information requested by the prompts. You will need to speak the information aloud on the phone.

steps.title: Write down the confirmation ID provided by the Activation Center.
steps.content: Write down the confirmation ID provided by the Activation Center. The confirmation ID will be 48 characters long.

steps.title: Enter the confirmation ID into the Activation Wizard on your computer.
steps.content: Enter the confirmation ID into the Activation Wizard on your computer. Once you have finished entering the ID, press â†µ Enter on your keyboard or click Next on the screen. Word will now be activated. [2] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Can I still activate Microsoft Word 2010?
steps.content: Can I still activate Microsoft Word 2010? Microsoft Office 2010 has been discontinued. While it will continue to function, it is recommended that you upgrade to a newer version of Microsoft Office. [3] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: What should I do if activating Word doesn't work?
steps.content: What should I do if activating Word doesn't work? If you try to activate Word and it doesn't work, go back to File > Help > Activate Product . Choose the option to activate by telephone, and then call the activation number provided. When the activation service picks up, don't say anything. Your call will be transferred to a support technician who can help you.

steps.title: What do I do if Word says I've installed it too many times?
steps.content: What do I do if Word says I've installed it too many times? If you have a license that allows you to install Word on multiple computers, you will need to contact Microsoft to get help. Go to File > Help > Activate Product . Choose the option to activate by telephone, and then call the activation number provided. When the activation service picks up, don't say anything. Your call will be transferred to a support technician who can help you. If your Word license doesn't allow you to install it on multiple computers, you can only have it installed once.

steps.title: What happens if I don't activate Word?
steps.content: What happens if I don't activate Word? If you never activate Microsoft Word 2010, it will eventually revert itself to "Reduced Functionality" mode. You will be able to open files, but cannot edit them. If this happens, you can still activate your copy of Word by going to File > Help > Activate Product .

steps.title: What do I do if I don't have my product key anymore?
steps.content: What do I do if I don't have my product key anymore? If you do not have the product key for Microsoft Office 2010, you must contact the seller to obtain the product key. For example, if you purchased Office 2010 from a retail store, you must contact Microsoft Support for a copy of the product key at https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/product/office/office-2010 ; if you purchased the product from an online store, you must contact the online store directly to obtain the product key. [4] X Research source
